title: ITALIAN CHEESE SALMON
directions: Mix all ingredients, except salmon and melted butter, in a large bowl until mixture comes together loosely. Pour melted butter in a baking dish; add salmon fillets. Press cheese mixture on top of salmon fillets and bake in a 350 oven about 15 minutes, or until done. Place under a broiler, a few inches from heat source, for a few minutes until topping is golden brown.
I serve this with a side dish of wild rice, mushrooms and green beans, or with baked asparagus.
ingredients: ½ cup	(2 Oz.) Shredded Smoked Cheese, such as provolone or gouda
3	or 4 Sun Dried Tomatoes, oil pack), finely chopped
⅓ cup	Thinly Sliced Green Onions
